attributes.action: Stop the public worker pay freeze imposed by Rishi Sunak
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair that MP's should get their pay rise while millions of public sector workers are expected to go without in the name of balancing the books
attributes.background: Allow the public workers the pay rise that they are entitled to

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reverse the disgraceful decision to yet again freeze public sector pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561208

No public sector pay freezes for the next 5 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320604

Fund an above inflation, respectful pay rise to all public sector workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
